summary: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.
cast: Marius Weyers|Sandra Prinsloo|N!xau|Louw Verwey|Michael Thys|Nic de Jager|Fanyana H. Sidumo|Joe Seakatsie|Brian O'Shaughnessy|Ken Gampu|Paddy O'Byrne|Graham Armitage|Vera Blacker|Pip Freedman|Katinka Heyns|Janet Meshad|Jamie Uys
title: Los dioses deben estar locos
